channel.title: ESLint on Draw Closer - A Blog by Sharon Wu
channel.description: Recent content in ESLint on Draw Closer - A Blog by Sharon Wu

item.title: Setting ESLint to Enhance Frontend Development
item.description:
Linting tools like ESLint allow developers to discover problems with their JavaScript code without executing it.

讓我們來談談如何以 ESLint 改進前端開發流程，且如何挑選 ESLint。
